name: Pimenton
description:
Movement

WASD / Arrow Keys

Jump

Spacebar

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. This was my very first game jam and I'm quite proud with how much I learned. The theme was inspired by the film Paprika and so I tried to capture that feeling a bit. Hope you enjoy it as much as I did making it. 

Tools

  • Unity Engine 2020.3.28f1
  • FEEL by More Mountains
  • Audacity

Special shoutout to the amazing tutorials that helped me with this process.

I learned the player controller from Bardent's youtube

and Samyam's youtube for improving my knowledge all around.
